perk.name: Assassin's Blade
perk.desc: Sword Kills boost movement speed and damage.

perk.name: En Garde
perk.desc: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this sword do additional damage.

perk.name: Whirlwind Blade
perk.desc: Consecutive rapid sword strikes increase this weapon's damage output.

perk.name: Relentless Strikes
perk.desc: Landing three light attack hits within a short time grants sword ammo.
perk.trigger: 3 or more rapid light attack hits

perk.name: Tireless Blade
perk.desc: Sword ammo granted for every other powered sword kill.

perk.name: Rampage
perk.desc: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.

perk.name: Kill Clip
perk.desc: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perk.trigger: Reloading quickly after kills with weapon

perk.name: High-Impact Reserves
perk.desc: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.

perk.name: Headseeker
perk.desc: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage for a short time.
perk.trigger: Head shots in a burst following a body shot

perk.name: Cluster Bomb
perk.desc: Rockets spawn cluster bombs upon detonation.

perk.name: Tap the Trigger
perk.desc: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.

perk.name: Under Pressure
perk.desc: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perk.trigger: Last 50% of rounds in the magazine

perk.name: Rapid Hit
perk.desc: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.

perk.name: Opening Shot
perk.desc: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.

perk.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
perk.desc: When holding down the trigger, this weapon's sway-reduction system boosts accuracy over time.

perk.name: Hip-Fire Grip
perk.desc: Ergonomic grips that increase accuracy and stability when firing from the hip.

perk.name: Firmly Planted
perk.desc: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.

perk.name: Slideshot
perk.desc: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.

perk.name: Outlaw
perk.desc: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.

perk.name: Threat Detector
perk.desc: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perk.trigger: Having 3 or more enemies in close proximity

perk.name: Zen Moment
perk.desc: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

perk.name: Quickdraw
perk.desc: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perk.trigger: Readying or stowing weapon, going ADS

perk.name: Snapshot Sights
perk.desc: Faster time to aim down sights.

perk.name: Field Prep
perk.desc: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.

perk.name: Rangefinder
perk.desc: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers and Grenade Launchers.

perk.name: Moving Target
perk.desc: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.

perk.name: Ambitious Assassin
perk.desc: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.

perk.name: Grave Robber
perk.desc: Melee kills reload a portion of this weapon's magazine. Grants ammo for Primary ammo weapons; reloads from reserves for Special and Heavy ammo weapons.

perk.name: Triple Tap
perk.desc: Rapidly landing precision hits will return 1 round to the magazine.

perk.name: Fourth Time's the Charm
perk.desc: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.

perk.name: Pulse Monitor
perk.desc: Auto-reloads part of the magazine when wielder is critically wounded.

perk.name: Auto-Loading Holster
perk.desc: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.

perk.name: Genesis
perk.desc: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perk.trigger: Breaking the shield of a target or matching damage type to shield

perk.name: Timed Payload
perk.desc: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.

perk.name: Explosive Payload
perk.desc: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact.

perk.name: Full Auto Trigger System
perk.desc: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

perk.name: Full Auto Trigger System (Shotguns)
perk.desc: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

perk.name: Backup Plan
perk.desc: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.

perk.name: Dragonfly
perk.desc: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.

perk.name: Air Assault
perk.desc: Gain increased handling while airborne.

perk.name: Box Breathing
perk.desc: Aiming this weapon for a short period without firing grants bonus range and precision damage that resets after firing or exiting zoom.

perk.name: Counterattack
perk.desc: Guarding while receiving damage grants a damage buff for 5 seconds.

perk.name: Demolitionist
perk.desc: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.

perk.name: Eye of the Storm
perk.desc: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.

perk.name: Feeding Frenzy
perk.desc: Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

perk.name: Firing Line
perk.desc: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies.

perk.name: Full Court
perk.desc: Increases detonation damage as the projectile travels further before exploding.

perk.name: Mulligan
perk.desc: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

perk.name: Multikill Clip
perk.desc: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.

perk.name: No Distractions
perk.desc: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.

perk.name: One-Two Punch
perk.desc: Hitting an enemy with every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for a short duration.

perk.name: Shattering Blade
perk.desc: If your heavy attack consumes the last of your ammo, it deals significantly increased damage. Excludes aerial attacks.

perk.name: Shield Disorient
perk.desc: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.

perk.name: Slideways
perk.desc: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.

perk.name: Subsistence
perk.desc: Kills partially reload the magazine from reserves, but reserve capacity is reduced.

perk.name: Surrounded
perk.desc: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

perk.name: Swashbuckler
perk.desc: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.

perk.name: Tracking Module
perk.desc: Adds tracking capability to rockets. Locks onto targets when aiming down sights.

perk.name: Trench Barrel
perk.desc: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

perk.name: Underdog
perk.desc: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed as your health gets lower.

perk.name: Osmosis
perk.desc: Using your grenade ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow it.

perk.name: Vorpal Weapon
perk.desc: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.

perk.name: Lead from Gold
perk.desc: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.

perk.name: Disruption Break
perk.desc: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.

perk.name: Elemental Capacitor
perk.desc: Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass. [Solar] increases reload speed [Arc] increases handling [Void] increases stability

perk.name: Clown Cartridge
perk.desc: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.

perk.name: Archer's Tempo
perk.desc: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.

perk.name: Explosive Head
perk.desc: Arrows explode after a short delay.

perk.name: Reversal of Fortune
perk.desc: Missing a shot returns the bullet to the magazine after a short duration.

perk.name: Archer's Gambit
perk.desc: Hipfire precision hits grant a massive draw-speed bonus for a short duration.

perk.name: Explosive Light
perk.desc: Picking up an Orb of Light increases the next grenade's blast radius and damage.

perk.name: Energy Transfer
perk.desc: Guarding while receiving damage generates class ability energy.

perk.name: Meganeura
perk.desc: Dragonfly deals more damage based on the number of precision hits dealt beforehand.

perk.name: Master of Arms
perk.desc: Kills with any weapon improve this weapon's damage for a short time.

perk.name: Overflow
perk.desc: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo reloads this weapon to beyond normal capacity.

perk.name: Killing Tally
perk.desc: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.

perk.name: Onslaught
perk.desc: This weapon's rate of fire increases as you stack Rampage.

perk.name: Micro-Missile
perk.desc: This weapon fires in a straight line and has a massively increased projectile speed.

perk.name: Reservoir Burst
perk.desc: When the battery is full, your next burst deals additional damage and causes enemies to explode on death.

perk.name: Dragonfly (Oxygen)
perk.desc: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.

perk.name: Sneak Bow
perk.desc: Increases hold time and reload speed while crouched.

perk.name: Flash Counter
perk.desc: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker.

perk.name: Celerity
perk.desc: Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam: • Increased target acquisition • Increased handling and reload speed • Reduced flinch from incoming fire

perk.name: Desperado
perk.desc: Reloading while Outlaw is active increases your rate of fire.

perk.name: Magnificent Howl
perk.desc: Rapidly landing two precision shots increases the next shot's damage and range for a short duration.

perk.name: Killing Wind
perk.desc: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.

perk.name: Unrelenting
perk.desc: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.

perk.name: Sympathetic Arsenal
perk.desc: Reloading after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.

perk.name: Iron Gaze
perk.desc: Massively improves weapon target acquisition at the cost of weapon range.

perk.name: Iron Grip
perk.desc: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of reload speed.

perk.name: Surplus
perk.desc: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.

perk.name: Wellspring
perk.desc: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.

perk.name: Thresh
perk.desc: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.

perk.name: Dual Loader
perk.desc: Reloads two shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.

perk.name: One for All
perk.desc: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.

perk.name: Chain Reaction
perk.desc: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion.

perk.name: Reconstruction
perk.desc: This weapon slowly reloads itself over time, up to double capacity.

perk.name: Recombination
perk.desc: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot.

perk.name: Redirection
perk.desc: Damaging rank-and-file combatants increases damage against more powerful ones.
